headline.main: Nicotine Gum a Boon That the Experts Say Should Be Used More

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: More than four years after it was approved by the Food and Drug Administration for sale as a prescription drug, nicotine gum's effectiveness in helping people quit smoking has been well established in clinical trials.
docs.snippet: LEAD: More than four years after it was approved by the Food and Drug Administration for sale as a prescription drug, nicotine gum's effectiveness in helping people quit smoking has been well established in clinical trials.

byline.original: By ROBIN MARANTZ HENIG; Robin Marantz Henig is a Washington-based medical writer whose books include ''How A Woman Ages.''

docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: DEFINITION OF disease is a tricky business.
